name: Both Sides of the Bugs
description:
Both Sides of the Bugs is a 3D FPS arena shooter that has been made for Mini Jam 48, my first game jam. It's theme is "Bugs" and it is used three times: beetles as enemies, a glitch in your spaceship and bugs in the code (of course)!

Story:

In this game, you are John Von Pulsar, one of the most dangerous, feared and respected space pirates in the galaxy. You have raided multiple space stations all by yourself. Now you are heading for the biggest station you have ever raided. However, a bug in the ship's code made the autopilot miscalculate the ship's trajectory and made you head for X-353, a planet notorious for its deadly bugs. Your new mission: survive, until uther pirates come and rescue you.

Controls:

WASD to move, SPACE to jump, LMB to shoot, Scroll wheel to switch guns, R to reload
